prefs-wikispeech:
{{optional}}
Used in user preferences as a tab heading.
prefs-wikispeech-voice: Used in user preferences as a section heading for voice selection.
prefs-wikispeech-speech-rate: Used in user preferences as a label for speech rate selection.
prefs-wikispeech-enable: Used in user preferences to enable the Wikispeech extension
prefs-wikispeech-show-player: Used in user preferences to always show the player where available
wikispeech-language:
Label for language field on the edit lexicon special page.
{{identical|Language}}
wikispeech-word:
Label for word field on the edit lexicon special page.
{{identical|Word}}
wikispeech-transcription: Label for phonetic transcription field on the edit lexicon special page.
wikispeech-preview: Label for preview button on the edit lexicon special page.
wikispeech-lexicon-add-entry-success: Displayed on the success page after adding a lexicon entry with Special:EditLexicon.
